Uses of Class
opendial.bn.distribs.UtilityTable

  • Packages that use UtilityTable 
    Package Description
    opendial  
    opendial.bn.distribs

    • Uses of UtilityTable in opendial

      Methods in opendial that return UtilityTable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UtilityTable DialogueState.queryUtil(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> variables)
      Returns the utility table associated with a particular set of (state or action) variables.

    • Uses of UtilityTable in opendial.bn.distribs

      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs that return UtilityTable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UtilityTable UtilityTable.copy()
      Returns a copy of the utility table
      UtilityTable UtilityTable.getNBest(int nbest)
      Creates a table with a subset of the utility values, namely the N-best highest ones.

    • Uses of UtilityTable in opendial.inference

      Methods in opendial.inference that return UtilityTable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default UtilityTable InferenceAlgorithm.queryUtil(BNetwork network, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> queryVars)
      Computes the utility table for the query variables (typically action variables), assuming no additional evidence.
      default UtilityTable InferenceAlgorithm.queryUtil(BNetwork network, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> queryVars, Assignment evidence)
      Computes the utility table for the query variables (typically action variables), given the provided evidence.
      default UtilityTable InferenceAlgorithm.queryUtil(BNetwork network, java.lang.String queryVar)
      Computes the utility table for the query variable (typically an action variable), assuming no additional evidence.
      default UtilityTable InferenceAlgorithm.queryUtil(BNetwork network, java.lang.String queryVar, Assignment evidence)
      Computes the utility table for the query variable (typically an action variable), given the provided evidence
      UtilityTable InferenceAlgorithm.queryUtil(Query.UtilQuery query)
      Computes the utility table for the query variables (typically action variables), given the provided evidence.
      UtilityTable SwitchingAlgorithm.queryUtil(Query.UtilQuery query)
      Selects the best algorithm for performing the inference on the provided utility query and return its result.

    • Uses of UtilityTable in opendial.inference.approximate

      Methods in opendial.inference.approximate that return UtilityTable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UtilityTable SamplingAlgorithm.queryUtil(Query.UtilQuery query)
      Queries for the utility of a particular set of (action) variables, given the provided evidence

    • Uses of UtilityTable in opendial.inference.exact

      Methods in opendial.inference.exact that return UtilityTable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UtilityTable NaiveInference.queryUtil(Query.UtilQuery query)
      Computes the utility distribution for the Bayesian network, depending on the value of the action variables given as parameters.
      UtilityTable VariableElimination.queryUtil(Query.UtilQuery query)
      Queries for the utility of a particular set of (action) variables, given the provided evidence
